name: Big Bank PLC - Core Banking System
description: This workspace models the core banking system of Big Bank PLC using Domain-Driven Design concepts and the Open Domain Schema.

domains.name: Retail Banking
domains.description: All aspects of retail banking operations.

subdomains.name: Core Banking
subdomains.description: Core banking operations including accounts and transactions.

boundedContexts.name: Accounts Management
boundedContexts.description: Handles customer accounts and related operations.

boundedContexts.name: Transactions Management
boundedContexts.description: Manages customer transactions and financial operations.

boundedContexts.name: Ledger Management
boundedContexts.description: Maintains the financial ledger and accounting records.

subdomains.name: Identity and Access Management
subdomains.description: Manages customer identities, authentication, and access control.

boundedContexts.name: Access Control
boundedContexts.description: Handles access control and permissions for banking services.

boundedContexts.name: Know Your Customer (KYC)
boundedContexts.description: Ensures compliance with KYC regulations and customer verification.

boundedContexts.name: Digital Access
boundedContexts.description: Provides digital access to banking services managing logins, sessions, and user authentication and authorisation flows.

boundedContexts.name: Customer Banking
boundedContexts.description: Enables customers to view accounts, make transfers, and deposit cheques.
